Description:
Urban style, undeniable convenience
CONTACT AGENT FOR PRIVATE INSPECTION.
Apartment living has never been so spacious and secure than at the elegant South Point complex, tranquilly set yet moments to all your essential needs and indulgences. An ideal home for professionals, empty nesters, first homebuyers and savvy investors, with secure entry and lift service.
Beautifully maintained and smartly appointed with high quality granite kitchen, Smeg appliances incl electric oven, gas cooktop and dishwasher enhanced by glass splashbacks and a breakfast bar that opens to a large living and dining domain. Saturated in natural light, entertaining and everyday relaxation can be raised to new heights with an exceptionally large north-facing balcony, blessed with views of the mountain ranges.
Two light splashed bedrooms are fully robed, master with double sided walk-through robes and smart ensuite with stone topped vanity, 2nd bedroom with a wall of BIRs and main bathroom with bath and sleek stone finishes.
Step outside to cosmopolitan living with first class shopping, dining, gyms and entertainment at Westfield Doncaster. Minutes to Jackson Court and Macedon Square eateries/cafes. Zoned to Doncaster Primary and Secondary. Spend your weekends exploring the Koonung Trail or just a short drive to Ruffey Lake Park and Aquarena for all your fitness and leisure needs. Incredible connections to local hospitals, city express buses, Box Hill Central and train station. You will be hard pressed to find a better locale than this!
Additionally featuring 3 x split system heating/cooling, quality carpets and window furnishings incl sheers in living area, large linen and storage cupboards, separate laundry, intercom and single secure basement carpark.

Please contact agent for a private inspection
Number 5 Gully Lane is situated on the Tullamore Estate amongst a beautiful blend of family homes, townhouses, apartments surrounded by walking trails, parks and play areas all showcased by landscaped streets.
This architecturally designed stunning townhouse is only 17klms from the Melbourne CBD and a 10 minute walk to Westfield Doncaster. Close to Park and Ride with express buses to the city and quick access to Eastlink and the Eastern Freeway.
This almost new townhouse has no body corporate fees offering 4 Bedrooms, 2 Bathrooms, and a double lock up garage with internal entry. The impressive entry has a marble statement piece at the timber front door with a matching timber garage door.
On the ground floor level there is a modern state of the art designer white kitchen with a large pantry, plentiful cupboards, Smeg oven, hotplates and dishwasher. Premium stone benchtops enhance this space that adjoins an open-plan living and dining area. Large windows and doors across this room lead to a private paved courtyard with space to BBQ and entertain. The very generous laundry has loads of built-in cupboards plus its own access to the back garden.
A powder room is available on the ground level and upstairs you will find a luxury master bedroom with walk in robe, a balcony and the ensuite provides a double shower and twin vanities.
The additional three bedrooms with double robes and a central bathroom offer flexibility for a growing family. A retreat/rumpus room is also upstairs to relax and enjoy.
This beautiful low maintenance home with impressive finishes will suit the busy professionals, families, or those wanting a premium home close to everything.

Ample storage

Description:
Luxurious Sophistication and Superior Design
Private Inspections By Appointment Only (Photo ID Required).
Gracing an elevated site backing onto parkland in a privileged cul-de-sac position, this lavishly appointed modern French-Provincial residence displays lovely landscaped gardens and exudes luxury with a versatile floorplan, in a quiet premium locale with close proximity to schools and Westfield Doncaster. Superior furnishings, grand proportions and refined colour palettes combine in the exquisite five bedroom, five bathroom accommodation. The beautiful interiors are accented by French Oak parquetry floors, imported crystal chandeliers and a gracious stairway. Skilfully conceived decor is evident throughout with the stately foyer introducing tasteful formal living, flowing onto an expansive family and dining zone connecting via stacker sliding doors to superb sheltered alfresco entertaining overlooking garden greenery. The connoisseur's stone / Bosch-attired adjoining kitchen boasts twin ovens, built-in microwave and coffee machine, induction stovetop, soft-close cabinetry, ultra-wide island bench and coveted Butlers Pantry with second 5-burner stovetop, integrated dishwasher and abundant cupboards. A generous adjacent living space is a perfect retreat and also accesses the alfresco terrace. An elegant downstairs bedroom hosts a walk-in-robe and two-way ensuite with separate toilet. Upstairs the sumptuous master suite hosts French doors opening to a charming balcony, a large walk-in-robe, a handy study or dressing area and luxurious twin-vanity ensuite with freestanding bath. Three further double bedrooms each benefit from their own walk-in-robe and ensuite and is annexed by an attractive retreat area. Features include upstairs powder room, ducted heating/refrigerated cooling (zoned to all rooms), gas log fireplace, video intercom, alarm security and double auto garage with internal entry.
An impressive new home enhanced by being within close proximity to Westfield Doncaster, St. Gregory the Great Primary School and ideally situated to further schools, Macedon Square Plaza, Templestowe Village and entry to the Eastern Freeway.

Magnificently proportioned for growing families and filled with natural light, this grand, 4 bedroom, executive townhouse has been meticulously crafted with an eye for quality and is beautifully presented in as new condition. Superbly appointed from top-to-bottom, just moments from Westfield Doncaster and merely metres from the Park & Ride, the home is remarkably easy to maintain, making it the perfect option for families with better things to do than spend their weekends in the garden.
